attributes.action: Government set up businesses to pay off nations debts.
attributes.additional_details: The UK has tremendous debts. Those debts need to be paid off if we are going to carry on welfare spending and just keep the economy going if interest rates go up, government bond prices goes down and the cost of servicing of our nations finance goes up. The government should set up businesses to sell services purely to foreign nationals living abroad and with all the profits being used to pay off our nations debts.
